name: Hippie Defender: The Vegan Course
description:
Due to the covid-19 pandemic, Juancho decides to be a self-sustaining hippie (inspired by the Doomsday Preppers) and moves himself to the outskirts of his city.

He is dedicated to growing his own food, however his life is not easy since the town is cursed and is besieged by hordes of evil entities.
